messages.content: Help me write a follow up email with a client launchgood.com Asim who's incharge of people and hr at the org. I did a demo of. our platform and he showed interest in having us use our platform and facilitate something with them sometime in Aguust. he's now taking a vacation, what's a nice meail I can share with him where I show a demo video to stay top of mind?

Certainly! Crafting a polite, respectful, and friendly follow-up email is important for maintaining a good relationship with the client. Here's an example email that you could consider sending to Asim at launchgood.com:

---

Subject: Follow-Up on Our Recent Demo & Exciting Video for Your Consideration

Dear Asim,

I hope this email finds you well. First and foremost, I would like to extend my warmest wishes for a relaxing and enjoyable vacation. It’s always essential to take some time for oneself. 

I wanted to take a moment to follow up on the demo I conducted for LaunchGood recently. I was thrilled by your enthusiasm and the prospect of facilitating a collaboration in August. Your role in People and HR is pivotal, and I believe our platform can provide immense value to your team and the broader organization.

To keep the momentum going and to provide you with more insights into our platform, I am sharing a short demo video that showcases some exciting features and functionalities that I believe will resonate with your goals and objectives at LaunchGood.

[Insert Link to Demo Video Here]

Please feel free to share this video with any colleagues who might also be interested. I am confident that it will serve as a great conversation starter for our potential collaboration.

As you’ll be on vacation, I want to ensure that I respect your time to unwind. Whenever you’re back and settled, please don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any questions, or if you’d like to discuss next steps for our collaboration in August. 

Wishing you a fantastic vacation, Asim! Looking forward to the opportunity to work together and make a positive impact.

Warm regards,

[Your Full Name]
[Your Position]
[Your Company]
[Contact Information]

---

This email is respectful of Asim’s vacation time, and it provides him with an engaging resource (the demo video) to review at his leisure. The tone is friendly, and it highlights the potential value that your platform can bring to LaunchGood. Additionally, it communicates your eagerness to collaborate without being pushy.
can you make it much shorter

Certainly! Here's a more concise version of the follow-up email:

---

Subject: Quick Follow-Up & Demo Video for LaunchGood

Hello Asim,

Hope you have a rejuvenating vacation ahead!

I'm briefly touching base regarding our recent demo. As discussed, here’s a quick demo video that highlights key features of our platform:

[Insert Link to Demo Video Here]

Feel free to review at your convenience. I'm excited about the possibility of collaborating in August. Let’s connect when you’re back to discuss further.

Safe travels!

Best regards,

[Your Full Name]
[Your Position]

---

This shortened email still conveys enthusiasm and respect for Asim's vacation, while providing him with the demo video to review.
